title: Degree Programs
cleaned_text: Degree Programs The University of Natural Medicine is a private, non-profit 501(C)3 institution that is devoted to higher education in the field of Natural , Integrative and Naturopathic Medicine, Mind-Body Therapy and Contemplative Studies. We offer individually designed Distance Learning Degree and Diploma Programs, Independent Study, Seminars, Practical and Clinical Training and Research, Worldwide Affiliate Clinics and an International Faculty of more than 50 distinguished educators and practitioners. To view our course catalog and admissions application [visit request information >](/request-information) Explore our degree and diploma offerings: COLLEGE OF NATURAL AND INTEGRATIVE MEDICINE Natural Health Sciences, BS / MS / PhD Clinical Nutrition, BS / MS Botanical Medicine, MS Homeopathic Medicine, MS Natural Medicine, DNM Traditional Naturopath, TN Integrative Medicine, MS / PhD / IMD Naturopathic Medicine, ND COLLEGE OF MIND-BODY AND INTEGRATIVE STUDIES Mind-Body Studies, MA DIPLOMA & CERTIFICATE PROGRAMS Nutritional Consultant and Health Coach Iridology Natural Animal Health Botanical Medicine Integrative Medicine & Holistic Nursing Homeopathic Medicine Ayurvedic Therapies
